Category: Mount

AC 21, Fortitude 19, Reflex 17, Will 15Perception+8

Traits

Sturdy Mount (mount)

The dreadmount can move 1 square fewer than an effect specifies when subjected to a pull, a push, or a slide. When an attack would knock it or its rider prone, the dreadmount can make a saving throw to prevent it or its rider from falling prone.

Standard Actions

Bite ✦ At-Will

Attack: Melee 1 (one creature); +10 vs. AC

Hit: 2d6 + 6 damage.

Triggered Actions

Wing Slam ✦ At-Will

Trigger: While the hippogriff is not flying, an adjacent enemy willingly moves without teleporting to a square that is not adjacent to the dreadmount.

Attack (Immediate Interrupt): Melee 1 (triggering enemy); +8 vs. Reflex

Hit: 2d6 + 6 damage, and the target falls prone.
